thread.title: Officials: Man seriously hurt after falling from roof deck - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Officials: Man seriously hurt after falling from roof deck - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Officials: Man seriously hurt after falling from roof deck - Massachusetts news
text:
BOSTON (AP) — A young man has been seriously injured in a three-story fall from the roof deck of a Boston home.
Emergency Medical Services officials say the 18-year-old man fell early Friday morning from a three-story home on Hillside Street the city’s Mission Hill neighborhood.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The man fell onto concrete. His name was not made public.
Several ambulances responded to the scene. The victim was taken to Brigham and Women’s hospital with what were described as serious internal injuries.
The fall remains under investigation.
